headline: Major Patent Verdict Against Apple Might Change The Case For Investing In Apple (AAPL)
summary: Earlier this month, a U.S. District Court jury ruled that Apple infringed Masimo’s Patent No. 10,433,776 and awarded Masimo US$634 million in damages. This verdict highlights increased legal risks for Apple, underscoring the ongoing challenges major technology companies face regarding intellectual property disputes. We’ll examine how this major patent infringement verdict could impact Apple’s investment narrative, particularly in relation to regulatory and legal risk management. Trump's oil...

headline: Nvidia’s Stock Is Sinking as Doubts About Its AI Dominance Grow
summary: Shares of the chipmaker fell 2.6% on Tuesday following a report suggesting that Alphabet Inc.’s AI processors are gaining ground.  The stock is down 14% since the start of this month, erasing more than $700 billion in market value, as investors grow increasingly fearful of a bubble in AI spending as well as Nvidia’s circular investments in startups like OpenAI that are also customers.  “Nvidia’s valuation was really based on the idea that it would maintain its market share,” said Adam Sarhan, chief executive officer of 50 Park Investments.

content.title: Nvidia’s Stock Is Sinking as Doubts About Its AI Dominance Grow
content.summary: Shares of the chipmaker fell 2.6% on Tuesday following a report suggesting that Alphabet Inc.’s AI processors are gaining ground.  The stock is down 14% since the start of this month, erasing more than $700 billion in market value, as investors grow increasingly fearful of a bubble in AI spending as well as Nvidia’s circular investments in startups like OpenAI that are also customers.  “Nvidia’s valuation was really based on the idea that it would maintain its market share,” said Adam Sarhan, chief executive officer of 50 Park Investments.

headline: Apple Stock Heads for Record as Big Tech Pecking Order Gets Reshuffled
summary: It may be too early to declare a new sheriff in residence, but Google parent  Alphabet  emergence as the hottest new thing in artificial intelligence has triggered a massive realignment among the world’s biggest tech stocks.  Google is set to open at a fresh record high on Wednesday, with a market value of just under $4 trillion, to extend its November advance to around 17%.  On the downside,  Nvidia  stock is set to open more than 15% south of its last all-time peak, as it and slowly careens through correction territory heading into the final month of the year.

content.title: Apple Stock Heads for Record as Big Tech Pecking Order Gets Reshuffled
content.summary: It may be too early to declare a new sheriff in residence, but Google parent  Alphabet  emergence as the hottest new thing in artificial intelligence has triggered a massive realignment among the world’s biggest tech stocks.  Google is set to open at a fresh record high on Wednesday, with a market value of just under $4 trillion, to extend its November advance to around 17%.  On the downside,  Nvidia  stock is set to open more than 15% south of its last all-time peak, as it and slowly careens through correction territory heading into the final month of the year.
